name: I'm On Merrymaking Watch
description:
Keep a sharp eye on those monitors! See any Christmas festivities? File a report!

In I'm On Merrymaking Watch you must monitor live surveillance camera feeds and spot Christmas related festivities, then report them by specifying what type of festivity it is, and in which room the festivity is located. Festivities can be anything from presents and Christmas trees, to gingerbread cookies and Santa's elves. Or maybe even Santa Claus himself? Are you able to keep the client's house festivity free?

CONTROLS
Use mouse to move cursor and left click the on screen buttons.
Optional: Use keyboard left and right keys to switch between cameras.
